titleStmt.title: The Second part of the tragedy of Amboyna: or, A true relation of a most bloody, treacherous, and cruel design of the Dutch in the New-Netherlands in America. For the total ruining and murthering of the English colonies in New-England. Being extracted out of several letters very lately written from New-England to several gentlemen and merchants in London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Matthews, at the sign of the Cock in St Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Cock in St Pauls Church-yard.
